pages.text: Entity Hunter is a point-type spell form.$(br)$(t:Raising these values of the form can increase the profit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Growth Needsï¼š$(/t)$(t:Increasing the Force of the form can increase the profit)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(br2)Can capture non-friendly unit entities within the range, and use the wand on the entity hunter to obtain a spell form.
